title.rendered: Food Delivery Website for your Restaurant

content.rendered:
The prevalent restrictions around the Covid 19 have caused all the restaurants across the country to halt all the dine-in-services, with many people staying at home and turning towards food delivery websites and apps. The demand for food delivery has exploded during the COVID-19 pandemic as consumers self-isolate and restaurants close down. Food Delivery Website for your Restaurant

Food Delivery Drivers across have experienced a tripling of their total orders and it seems like people are turning more to this delivery and take-away as the stay at home orders are put into place.

Need of a Food Delivery Website

In this covid situation many customs have download the food delivery apps. You are finding a way to sell out your food but How? Food Delivery apps will charge more of the commission. That will not be a profitable deal for you. How about your own food delivery website.

HawksCode Software Pvt Ltd had successfully developed following Food Delivery Website for your Restaurant. These Food Delivery Apps give your custom an experience of enjoying your Restaurant delicious food at there Door Step.

NavhooFood
MoChow
The BALMORAL
APFEL

Questions Ask for Food Delivery Service

  • Availability of Labor during Covid situation
  • How to do food delivery with Safety and Precautions.

Food Delivery Website Features

Firstly need to consider it to be a Desktop App or Cross Platform Web App. Features and modules according to customer preference.

The Food Delivery Dashboard

It should include the following features

  • Manage Staff
  • Process Orders
  • Assign Orders to Delivery Staff
  • Managing Payments and Finance
  • Offers, Rewards and Promo Codes
  • Mange Contact Details of Staff and Customers
Customer
  • Login/Registration, Delivery Address, Current and Past Order
  • More Reliable and Secured Payment Methods.
  • Communicate with Delivery Person
  • Rate and Reviews of the delivery service
  • Apply Promo Code and Offer
Delivery
  • Check the list of available orders, and accept further orders
  • Get order details
  • Contacting customers
  • Getting paid and tips from customers

How It Works?

A Customer Order a Food from this Web App. One Notification will pop up to the restaurant staff. They accept the order and start preparing food. Delivery person will get a message regarding pickup and drop point. The customer can pay through any payment gateway or can pay Cash. After receiving food customer can give rate and review.

Cost To Create a Food Delivery Website

It depends on the features and technology use in Food Delivery Web App. Estimation cost will be 15k-20k USD.

Your Own Food Delivery Website

HawksCode Software Pvt Ltd can help you set up your own food delivery website in your Budget with more then 8+ years of experience in Web, Mobile Application development. With the quality and innovative ideas successfully completed more then 1500 plus project with client satisfaction.

I hope you like this blog, to learn more visit HawksCode and Easyshiksha
